sections.heading: Data protection information
sections.subtitle: Pursuant to Articles 13 and 14 of GDPR 2016/679.
content: The companies Bongiorno Srl - PIVA 10408830155 - Address: Via Marsala, 40 - 21013 Gallarate (Varese) inform you that your data will be processed in the following ways.

sections.heading: Subject of processing and purpose
content: We process your personal identifying information (e.g., first name, last name, and e-mail) - hereafter "data" - that you have provided in order to fulfill your request in the "Contact Us" section of the site and in the "Quotes" section.

sections.heading: Legal Basis
list: Execution of a contract or pre-contractual measures;

sections.heading: Mode and duration of treatment
content: The processing of your personal data is carried out in the manner prescribed by current data protection regulations.

It may consist of the collection, recording, organization, storage, consultation, processing, modification, selection, extraction, comparison, use, interconnection, blocking, communication, deletion and destruction of data.

Your data are subject to both paper and electronic and/or automated processing. They will be processed in accordance with the principles of fairness, lawfulness, transparency and protection of your privacy and rights.
They will be processed for the duration of the contractual relationship and also thereafter for the fulfillment of all legal requirements.

sections.heading: Data access
content: Your data may be made accessible for the purposes described above:
list: To employees and collaborators of the Data Controller in all its operational and logistical locations, within and outside the EU, in their capacity as internal data processors and/or system administrators; administrative area employees; commercial area employees; operational area employees.

To subjects outside our structure (e.g. suppliers of the servers that host the site and our telecommunications), with whom precise agreements have been made on the measures to be taken to ensure the security of the data entrusted to them; in any case, the data will be processed exclusively for the pursuit of the above-mentioned purposes.

sections.heading: Disclosure of data
content: The Data Controller may communicate your data for the purposes of this policy only to those for whom communication is required by law.

sections.heading: Place of data processing and transfer
content: Your data is located at the registered office. Any transfers, due to circumstances for which it is mandatory by law and/or for the fulfillment of the aforementioned purposes, will be carried out in the full protection of your interests.

sections.heading: Storage time
content: Unless you explicitly express your desire to remove them, your personal data will be kept as long as necessary with respect to the legitimate purposes for which they were collected and, in any case, for the fulfillment of legal obligations.

sections.heading: Rights of the data subject
content: As a data subject, you may exercise the rights enshrined in Articles 15-22 GDPR, including:
list: Right to file a complaint with the Guarantor Authority.

sections.heading: Ways of exercising rights
content: You may exercise your rights at any time by sending an email to:

marocco.title: Morocco Transportation
marocco.claim: Our dedication to Morocco has been well established for decades. We selected and strengthened over time a partnership with a local entity that would travel on our wavelength. To achieve the common goal of giving customers more and more reasons to choose our service.
marocco.intro: We offer transportation from Spain, France and Italy to major ports in Morocco.
paragraphs: Our decades of experience allow us to guarantee the best timelines in the Moroccan market.
We know how speed, not only in transportation, but also and especially in interventions on all local dynamics, are a trump card in giving our shipping services a guarantee of quality.

We know the importance of documentation that enables all traders to bring their transactions to a successful conclusion, and we advise and suggest, even before the shipment begins, any specifics that make this possible.
services: Regular Groupage services by sea on Casablanca
Possibility of boarding dangerous goods in full and groupage, rolling stock and exceptional loads
Ability to make door-to-door deliveries throughout Morocco
Weekly transportation to the ports of Tangier and Casablanca.
Fastest Transit Time
All Risk Insurance on Demand

libia.title: Transport Libya and Mauritania
libia.claim: Full coverage of the Maghreb also brings us here. With the same care and attention with regular full container services to major ports.
libia.intro: We offer transportation from Spain, France and Italy to major Libyan and Mauritanian ports.
paragraphs: Our decades of experience and ISO9001-certified quality of our services enable us to guarantee fast and efficient comprehensive transportation services.
services: Regular services in full containers
Weekly transportation to the ports of Tripoli, Misrata and Benghazi, Nouakchott and Nouadhibou
Possibility of boarding dangerous goods and exceptional loads
All Risk Insurance on Demand

mondo.title: World Transportation
mondo.claim: Thanks to our WCA partners, we arrive everywhere with the quality guaranteed by the most important and extensive network of international forwarders.
mondo.intro: Globally certified services guaranteed by our membership in the WCA network.
services: Network WCA Service Guarantee
AEO operator qualification and ISO 9001 quality.
Regular departures in full containers and groupage
Possibility of transporting Project Cargo, dangerous goods and exceptional loads
Use of regular vectors of primary importance and reliability
All Risk Insurance on Demand

algeria.title: Algeria Transportation
algeria.claim: We have been present with our own structure in the territory for many years. We know its dynamics and peculiarities. We experience regulatory changes on a daily basis and are able to take immediate action to make sure they are complied with.
algeria.intro: We offer transportation from Spain, France and Italy to the ports of Algiers, Oran and all major Algerian ports.
paragraphs: The experience gained over time and the presence of its own staff in the area guarantee the quality of services and reliability of the infrastructure made available to customers.
We know how speed, not only in transportation, but also and especially in interventions on all local dynamics, are a trump card in giving our shipping services a guarantee of quality.

We know the importance of documentation that enables all traders to bring their transactions to a successful conclusion, and we advise and suggest, even before the shipment begins, any specifics that make this possible.
services: Regular Groupage services by sea on Algiers and Oran
Regular services in containers on all Algerian ports
Possibility of boarding dangerous goods in full and groupage, rolling stock and exceptional loads
Ability to make door-to-door deliveries throughout Algeria
Fastest Transit Time
All Risk Insurance on Demand

tunisia.title: Tunisia Transportation
tunisia.claim: We are a point of reference in the country for transportation to and from Mediterranean Europe.
tunisia.intro: Continued growth thanks to our clients whose loyalty and gratitude have given us the impetus to try to respond, with ever greater care and attention, to their expectations and requests.
paragraphs: We offer transportation from Spain, France and Italy to the ports of Tunis, Sousse and Sfax.
Our decades of experience and complete supply chain with locally owned warehouses and staff allows us to guarantee the best timing in the Tunisian market.
The experience gained over time and the presence of its own staff in the area guarantee the quality of services and reliability of the infrastructure made available to customers.
We know how speed, not only in transportation, but also and especially in interventions on all local dynamics, are a trump card in giving our shipping services a guarantee of quality.

We know the importance of documentation that enables all traders to bring their transactions to a successful conclusion, and we advise and suggest, even before the shipment begins, any specifics that make this possible.
services: Tri-weekly Groupage Services on Tunis, Sousse and Sfax

hero.title: BONGIORNO TRANSPORTS
hero.subtitle: International Shipments
hero.claim: Since 1985 we have been connecting the main European Mediterranean ports with the Maghreb with dedication and care: primarily Tunisia, Algeria and Morocco, but also many other destinations, serving more than 60 countries around the world every year.

intro: Our services in the ports of North Africa are structured to ensure particularly favorable transport conditions, but above all to guide and assist operators in all phases preceding shipments and leading them to success.

It is our daily presence on the ground that allows us to always be up to date with procedures and regulations that often change in these markets. To achieve this goal, we have heavily invested in the infrastructure and the people who enable us to operate dynamically and effectively.

We are present in Tunisia at the three main ports: Tunis, Sousse, and Sfax. In Algeria, our Algiers office manages and ensures the operation of all Algerian ports. In Morocco, we benefit from a consolidated agency relationship that, over time, has allowed us to grow and strengthen the solidity and reliability of our services.
Bongiorno Spain and Bongiorno France complete our structure, allowing us to cover all the main traffic channels that, from Europe, flow into the Mediterranean towards North African destinations.
Our watchwords: Punctuality, Availability, and Reactivity to effectively face all possible contingencies.
We are ready to be your trusted partner for every transport to North Africa and beyond.

items.title: Tunisia Transportation
items.text: In our DNA from the beginning. Our historic line since 1985.

items.title: Algeria Transportation
items.text: Great country in which we believed and invested by building tailor-made services.

items.title: Morocco Transportation
items.text: We escort your goods to the door of your client. From the desert to the peaks of the Atlas.

items.title: Libya and Mauritania
items.text: The total coverage of the Maghreb also brings us here. With the same care and attention.

items.title: World
items.text: Thanks to our WCA-certified partners, we reach everywhere with the highest guarantees.

services.title: Services
intro: Your trust is the engine of our transports. We look forward to proving to you that we can exceed your expectations. Choose our transport solutions and discover the true meaning of a first-class shipping service.

items.title: Groupage Transport
items.description: Trusting those who know how to handle small and medium shipments with the right care and speed is vital to never interrupting productive or commercial activity.

items.title: Exceptional Transport and Project Cargo
items.description: A type of transport that requires not only deep competence but also careful study of routes, regulations, and the characteristics of goods and territories of execution.

items.title: Full Containers Services
items.description: Extremely fast frequency and transit time, availability of space on board ships, and a wide variety of container types to meet the most diverse needs.

items.title: All Risks Insurance
items.description: For those who never want to leave anything to chance. An insurance policy on request that protects against all risks during transport. The key to a serene shipment. Our robust all-risks policy is available on request.

content.title: We are not just freight forwarders
content.intro1: We understand that the world of logistics can be complex, but we are here to make everything simpler for you.
content.intro2: What makes us different from others? Our mission is to ensure that your goods arrive at their destination in perfect condition and as quickly as possible.
content.intro3: We are proud to have created, over time, specialized services that allow us to manage shipments in the Maghreb and various other geographical areas with a unique and solid structure.
content.intro4: From the moment the goods leave the exporter‚Äôs door until they are made available to the importer, we monitor every step thanks to the training of our staff, capable of deeply understanding the dynamics and operations that an international transport entails. Keeping up with the innovations and changes that make our activity increasingly dynamic.
content.intro5: Our goal is to earn the trust of our clients by showing them that we work tirelessly for continuous growth.

blocks.title: We are the true protagonists of your transports
blocks.text1: Choosing Bongiorno means choosing safety and efficiency.
blocks.text2: Rely on us for all your international shipments and discover how we make freight transportation a serene experience.
blocks.text3: The AEO operator qualification and ISO 9001:2015 certification of our italian headquarters,  together with our participation in the WCA network, are guarantees that our quality of service is truly what we are proud to offer.
blocks.text4: To ensure maximum peace of mind for our clients, we also offer an optional ‚ÄúAll Risks‚Äù policy, which covers the entire amount of your sales invoice. No matter what happens during transport, you will always be safe.

quality.title: Our quality, certified and recognized
quality.text1: In 2014, we obtained AEO status for our customs operations, which is of enormous importance because it allows us greater speed in shipments, greater communication between parts of the supply chain and decreased security issues. It is the result of a careful verification procedure by the italian Customs and Monopolies Agency and is an element of interest to those who rely on our services. Add to this our ISO 9001 Certification, which has been obtained for many years now and is a further guarantee of quality for customers.

sedi.title: Locations
sedi.intro1: Thanks to the presence of our own staff and offices in 5 Mediterranean countries, we can handle shipments to and from the Maghreb with the expertise of those who live with the the constantly evolving daily dynamics of this area and with the speed of those who know the issues.
sedi.intro2: We guarantee immediate and direct interventions to always find the best solution that ensures each shipment is successfully completed. Additionally, choosing WCA-certified partners allows us to have highly professional and widespread support around the world, ensuring nothing is left to chance.
sedi.intro3: In addition, choosing WCA-certified partners enables us to be able to have highly professional and widespread support anywhere in the world. So that nothing is left to chance.

locations.name: Bongiorno Italy
description: Founded in 1985, Bongiorno SRL. is our parent company.
Based in Gallarate, just 5 minutes from Milan Malpensa Airport, it is a confluence point for major traffic lines from the industrial regions of north-central Italy.
Our proximity to the main commercial ports in the northern Mediterranean puts us in a privileged position to ensure extreme speed and effectiveness in executing transport mandates.

locations.name: Bongiorno Spain
description: Headquartered in Barcelona and with strategic logistics platforms in Spain and Portugal, Bongiorno Spain is able to ensure thorough and precise service throughout the Iberian Peninsula.
Bongiorno Spain is, today, a crucial reference in developing traffic towards North Africa.

locations.name: Bongiorno France
description: Our office is in Marseille, located on the main access route to the city and just 1 km from the port, a strategic point for maritime activity towards the ports of the Maghreb and the entire Mediterranean.

We also have logistic platforms in the most sensitive areas (Paris Region, Lyon Region, Northern France). Our trucking services additionally cover a large part of Germany and the entire Belgian and Dutch territories.

locations.name: Bongiorno Tunisia
description: Represents our first commercial and operational base in North Africa.
The operational structure available to Bongiorno Tunisia is considered one of the most significant realities in the Tunisian transport sector.

We utilize three container terminals with bonded warehouses in the main Tunisian ports (Rades, Sousse, and Sfax) that allow us to meet the needs of all Tunisian economic operators for any type of transport.

locations.name: Bongiorno Algeria
description: Algeria is a country in full economic development and a reality that increasingly asserts its significance on the international scene.

For this reason, in the early 2000s, we established Bongiorno Algeria, believing that our experience and professionalism could be a useful and appreciated tool by Algerian and European operators for their business development.

locations.name: Bongiorno in the World
description: The international nature of our business and our continuous growth have led us to expand our services beyond the borders of the countries where we are already well-established over time, thanks to the precious support and assistance of the agency network guaranteed by the World Trade Alliance of which we have been members since 2009.

quote.intro: Since 1985 we have been a lider in transportation between Europe and the Maghreb, Tunisia, Algeria and Morocco first and foremost, as well as many other destinations, serving more than 60 countries around the world each year.
features: Field offices in Tunisia, Algeria, Italy, Spain and France
Choice of insurance coverage including All Risk

services.title: Services
services.intro: With our experience and direct presence in major Mediterranean countries, we offer a full range of international transportation and logistics services designed to ensure punctuality, safety and convenience.

cards.title: Groupage Transportation
cards.text: For industry, commerce and major works, we have created services that give transportation the best yields and conditions. So that your goods are always on time.

cards.title: Complete Transportation
cards.text: Fast frequency and transit time, availability of space on board ships, and wide variety of containers on major Maghreb ports.

cards.title: Outstanding and Project Cargo
cards.text: Transportation that requires high expertise and careful study of routes, regulations, characteristics of goods and territories.

cards.title: All Risk Insurance
cards.text: To leave nothing to chance. An on-demand insurance policy that guards against any risk during transport.

details.title: Groupage Transportation
paragraphs: An extensive network of road operators covering the entire European territory ensures that goods arrive at our collection centers in the shortest possible time and with the best quality guarantees.
We make use of modern logistics areas equipped with highly efficient means and personnel, equipped with modern security systems and ready to adapt to a wide variety of needs.
We manage, with AEO operator qualification in Italy, customs operations directly at the collection centers, with our own staff and in real time.
The regularity and frequency of our services allows us to offer a variety of solutions unique to the Maghreb markets.

details.title: Complete Transportation
paragraphs: We understand that the success of an expedition depends on many variables, and our specialization makes us the ideal partner for every eventuality.
From the choice of shipping carrier to the availability of equipment, nothing is left to chance.
We have invested great resources to make each component more and more efficient to ensure maximum reliability and fast delivery.

details.title: Exceptional Transportation and Project Cargo
paragraphs: A type of transportation that requires high competence and careful study of routes, regulations and characteristics of goods.
We assess every eventuality to ensure that no technical or bureaucratic hiccups affect the outcome.
We work with the most reliable road and sea partners to ensure maximum safety.

details.title: All Risk Insurance
paragraphs: We consider All Risk coverage an enormously important tool, a guarantee that allows you to protect yourself from all possible risks during a transport.
We provide customers with a proven policy, available upon request for each shipment.

ctaBanner.cta_main: We guarantee immediate and direct interventions to always find the best solution for successful shipping.
ctaBanner.claim: Additionally, choosing WCA-certified partners allows us to provide highly professional and widespread support around the world. To leave nothing to chance.

cta.contattaci: Call or write and you will be put in touch with our salesperson best suited to your needs.
cta.parliamo: We speak Italian, French, Spanish, English and German

hero.title: Who we are
hero.subtitle: We have been engaged in international transportation since 1985, ensuring efficiency and reliability.

about.text1: In 1985, the story of our company began in Gallarate. It was the result of a great insight by our founder and President: recognizing the significant potential in Tunisia and the affinities that bind us, and investing in them.
about.text2: From the very beginning of our operations, we followed a policy of specialization, dedicating all our technical and human resources specifically to the Tunisian market and, in a second phase, to the entire Maghreb region.
about.text3: This approach has allowed our organization to consolidate itself in North African markets, becoming a key carrier for shipments to this region. We have always stayed focused on the actual needs of exporters and importers, adapting to the evolving realities of both the destination and origin markets of the goods.
about.text4: After consolidating our routes, we believed that our vision of transportation should extend beyond these borders, and that this would not diminish our identity but, on the contrary, enrich it.
about.text5: The international dimension of our transport services is now recognized daily by our clients, who increasingly trust us with the management of their shipments worldwide
about.subtitle: Our History
about.sede: Bongiorno's headquarters in Gallarate, 40 Marsala Street, the headquarters of the business.
